definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: Barriss said to let him help you strive for more, and all she is.
sentences.chinese: 芭麗說想讓他幫自己爭取更多，而且她是勢在必得。

sentences.english: Last night I took a painkiller so I had a good sleep.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚吃了粒“芬必得”才得有一夜好覺。

sentences.english: However, the dog looked determined, so he lead him into the office.
sentences.chinese: 而那狗看來是志在必得，於是經理把他帶進了辦公室。

sentences.english: He will bring me out to the light; I shall see his vindication.
sentences.chinese: 他必領我到光明中，我必得見他的公義。

sentences.english: She is confident of being awarded this scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 她對此次獎學金志在必得。

sentences.english: But your assistant, Joshua son of Nun, will enter it.
sentences.chinese: 伺候你，嫩的兒子約書亞，他必得進入那地。

sentences.english: That moment from Jesus a pardon receives.
sentences.chinese: 一信靠主就必得赦罪之恩。

sentences.english: We have got two home games coming up in the Premier League and we need to make them count.
sentences.chinese: 接下來有兩個聯賽的主場比賽，我們勢在必得。

sentences.english: Will Fenbid be harmful every month?
sentences.chinese: 芬必得每月喫會有害麼？

sentences.english: Do not those who plot evil go astray? But those who plan what is good find love and faithfulness.
sentences.chinese: 謀惡的豈非走入迷途嗎？謀善的必得慈愛和誠實。

sentences.english: Mrs Clinton’s “inevitable” march towards the Democratic nomination has been knocked badly.
sentences.chinese: 克林頓女士對民主黨提名的志在必得遇到麻煩。

sentences.english: but mercy and truth shall be to them that devise good.
sentences.chinese: 謀善的必得慈愛和誠實。

sentences.english: And the captivity of this host of the children of Israel shall possess that of the Canaanites, even unto Zarephath;
sentences.chinese: 在迦南人中被擄的以色列衆人，必得地直到撒勒法。

sentences.english: And the bloodshed will be atoned for.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，流血的罪必得赦免。

sentences.english: If you are reading the Bible every day, you will be greatly blessed and helped.
sentences.chinese: 我們若每天讀聖經，就必得神的祝福和幫助。

definition: to maintain/to adhere to/to observe (an injunction etc)
silent contemplation/to meditate/to think in silence
